title: Entanglement wedge cross section triangle information and holographic entanglement of assistance
summary: We identify a non-negative and upper-bounded entanglement signal in holography which is defined as a combination of entanglement wedge cross sections (EWCS) for a tripartite mixed state $ABE$: $\mathrm{EI}_Δ(A:B|E) = \mathrm{EWCS}(A:EB) + \mathrm{EWCS}(B:EA) - \mathrm{EWCS}(E:AB)$.
